item.description:
Central CT Singles invites you to the Extreme Neon Bowling Party with 1 FREE game + shoes and Half-Price Games for our group all Night!

Saturday, February 23 at 8 pm

Bowl 2 games for only $9 (including shoes)

Best Bowling Score wins a FREE Bowling Ball!

Free Billiards and Darts * Prizes * Drink Specials

Movies on the BIG Screen

Join us for the party and meet local singles at the Legends Lounge in:

AMF Bowling Center
748 Silver Lane
East Hartford, CT 06118
Phone: (860) 569-2990

We will have music, movies, FREE Billiards and Darts, gift certificates, prizes!

We will be in the Legends Lounge wearing black CTNites.com VIP Entertainment Clubbers T-Shirts.

RSVP on http://singles.meetup...

Admission includes the Central CT singles party AND 1 Free game with shoe rental ($9 value)

Tickets are only $15
ONLINE SPECIAL: Tickets are $12 online

More Singles = More Fun
- so print this certificate, bring it to the next Central CT Singles Event and you will:
Receive a half-price ticket with the purchase of 1 ticket or
Receive 1 FREE ticket with the purchase of 2 tickets

Visit http://www.CentralCTS... and print your More Fun Certificate.


See you at the party!

Jason
Central CT Singles
?Membership is FREE, Join Today and meet Local Singles?
http://www.CentralCTS...
(860) 236-3343

group.name: CTMatch Singles Events Music Dance Speed Dating Golf Comedy

item.name: Central CT Singles Extreme NEON Bowling Party with a FREE Game + Shoes
